import React from 'react'; const Navbar: React.FC = () => (
{/* Logo Section - Left Side */}
FOR A CURE
{/* Navigation Links - Right of Logo with Increased Spacing */}
e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--primary-blue)'} onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--text-dark)'}>Home e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--primary-blue)'} onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--text-dark)'}>About Us e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--primary-blue)'} onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--text-dark)'}>Research e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--primary-blue)'} onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--text-dark)'}>Get Involved e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--primary-blue)'} onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--text-dark)'}>News e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--primary-blue)'} onMouseOut={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.color = 'var(--text-dark)'}>Contact
{/* Action Buttons - Right Side */}
); export default Navbar;
